title: Patrick Mahomes, 49ers, OBJ, NCAA, and Jason Garrett
itunes:title: Patrick Mahomes, 49ers, OBJ, NCAA, and Jason Garrett
description:
Colin explains why we want the Chiefs to beat the Titans this weekend, why he prefers the 49ers offense over the Packers, his thoughts on the arrest warrant for Odell Beckham Jr., why some of the NCAA rules are ridiculous, and why he feels former Cowboys HC Jason Garrett is making a mistake. Guests include Miles Sanders, Greg Cosell, Geoff Schwartz, and Jeff Fisher.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
